attributes.action: Something needs to be done about predjudice actions
attributes.additional_details:
The goverment needs to do something, if racism is acepeted as wrong, why are there other subjects that scociety conclude as bad, but yet it continues.

As a country, we should be proud of culture coming to England, We are after all United. so why cant we be united together.

Make predjudism illiegal, and we would live in a better world
